frontmatter.title: Domain Theory in Constructive and Predicative Univalent Foundations

frontmatter.meta: Thm. 48 of de Jong and Escard贸

mainmatter.p: Let \mathcal{U} and \mathcal{V} be two universes. If \mathsf{ZornsLemma} ( \mathcal{U} \sqcup \mathcal{V} ^{+} , \mathcal{V} , \mathcal{V} ) holds then \mathsf{PropositionalResizing} ( \mathcal{U} , \mathcal{V} ) holds.

frontmatter.title: Zorn's Lemma in UF
frontmatter.meta: Defn. 47 of de Jong and Escard贸

mainmatter.p: Let \mathcal{U}, \mathcal{V}, and \mathcal{W} be universes. Zorns Lemma at ( \mathcal{U} , \mathcal{V} , \mathcal{W} ) asserts that every pointed ( \mathcal{U} , \mathcal{V} , \mathcal{W} )-dcpo has a maximal element.

frontmatter.meta: Prop. 3.i from de Jong and Escard贸

mainmatter.p: Let \mathcal{U} and \mathcal{V} be two universes. The \Omega ( \mathcal{U} , \mathcal{V} )-resizing axiom implies the propositional ( \mathcal{U} , \mathcal{V} )-resizing axiom.

frontmatter.title: Being -small
frontmatter.meta: Defn. 1 from de Jong and Escard贸

mainmatter.p: Let \mathcal{U} and \mathcal{V} be two universes. A type X : \mathcal{U} is called \mathcal{V}-small if it has a copy in universe \mathcal{V}, which is to say \mathsf{hasSize} ( X , \mathcal{V} ) \vcentcolon \equiv \sum _{ Y \ : \ \mathcal{V} } X \simeq Y .

frontmatter.title: The type of 卢卢-stable propositions
frontmatter.meta: Defn 2.iii of de Jong and Escard贸

mainmatter.p:
Let \mathcal{U} be a universe. The type of 
eg 
eg-stable propositions at universe \mathcal{U} is defined as: \Omega ^{ 
eg 
eg }_{ \mathcal{U} } \vcentcolon \equiv \sum _{ P \ : \ \Omega _{ \mathcal{U} } } \mathsf{isNotNotStable} ( P )

frontmatter.title: The 惟 (, )-resizing axiom
frontmatter.meta: Defn 2.ii from de Jong and Escard贸

mainmatter.p: Let \mathcal{U} and \mathcal{V} be two universes. The \Omega ( \mathcal{U} , \mathcal{V} )-resizing axiom says that the type \Omega _{ \mathcal{U} } is \mathcal{V}-small.
